thread.title: "I'm upset to leave": Calum Best is tenth housemate evicted from Celebrity Big Brother
thread.title_full: "I'm upset to leave": Calum Best is tenth housemate evicted from Celebrity Big Brother

author: Lara Martin
title: "I'm upset to leave": Calum Best is tenth housemate evicted from Celebrity Big Brother
text:
Calum Best has become the tenth housemate to be evicted from Celebrity Big Brother . 
The 35-year-old model - son of late footballer George Best - was booted from the house on Tuesday night during the final live eviction show ahead of Friday’s grand finale. 
All the housemates had faced eviction as the vote for the CBB winner opened over the weekend, meaning everyone was at risk of leaving. 
The housemates looked shock as Calum left. 
He admitted to Big Brother host Emma Willis he was "upset" to be leaving so close to the final, considering he made it all the way to the finale during his first attempt at the show. Calum Best enters the Celebrity Big Brother House at Elstree Studio (Photo: WireImage) Calum was upset to leave the house ahead of Friday's finale (Photo: Channel 5) 
When asked if he want to beat his previous try, he said: “Oh, yeah, without a doubt. I was upset to leave today if I’m honest with you.” 
He added: “You don’t get too comfortable. I put on an outfit that I was ready to come out in. I’m sad to come out now, they were very worthy opponents.” 
Calum said the days had started to “drag” inside the house and it had got to the stage where he was thinking it had to come to an end. 
“This time around hasn’t been tougher with the people, it’s been tougher with what Big Brother is bringing to the table.” 
That means Nicola McLean, Jedward, Kim Woodburn, Bianca Gascoigne, James Cosmo and Coleen Nolan have all made the final. Calum Best enters the Celebrity Big Brother House at Elstree Studio (Photo: Lia Toby/WENN.com) 
James Cosmo was also up for eviction, which confused some viewers, as he had received eternal immunity from eviction until the finale, but host Emma explained earlier today that ended this week as the vote had opened for the winner. Comment Below 
Emma explained: “This is the final eviction before the final on Friday and some people are asking how come James Cosmo is up. Well, you’re now voting for your winner so the vote to win is open and that’s why his name is in there as well. 
“Even though it’s an eviction, which is a bit confusing, it’s actually a vote to win from when the vote to win opened.” Emma (and her umbrella) at tonight's live eviction (Photo: Channel 5) The CBB host said it was a tight race when it came to tonight's results (Photo: Channel 5) Emma also spoke to Monday night's evictee, Jamie, during the episode (Photo: Channel 5) Jamie left CBB in a shock secret eviction on Monday (Photo: Channel 5) He was handcuffed and led away (Photo: Channel 5) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
